{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-895L |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00PVDNQ34 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/27/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-AC40 |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR895LA1 |ic_id=4216A-IR895LA1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709COKFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |fla2=32 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F2G16128A-BDB |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PCIe Bridge Controller;Asmedia;ASM1182e;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85402;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;8; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''5300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac5300-ultra-wi-fi-router/ Product page] (US) *OEM [[Alpha Networks]] [http://www.alphanetworks.com/en/product_detail/9e597323cf0f4230 ''WRG-AC40''] - Wireless AC5300 Tri-Band Router *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.technuter.com/pc-pheripharels/networking/broadcom-announces-industrys-most-advanced-5g-wifi-router-platform.html '''BCM4709C0'''] @1.4GHz DualCore (ARM Cortex-A9) ===Features=== *Five core processor (“pentacore”) to realize maximum speeds delivers over 3.8GHz :*[[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0 @1.4GHz Dual core ARM Cortex-A9 host processor :*Three BCM4366 4×4 radios, each with an integrated @800MHz A7 CPU for Wi-Fi processing *4 Gbps aggregate PHY rate, eight stream capability at 5GHz with 4 stream capability at 2.4GHz *Extended 5GHz support adds three additional 80MHz channels and two 160MHz channels *Zero-wait dynamic frequency selection (DFS) enables greater access and better use of cleaner 5GHz Wi-Fi channels resulting in faster downloads, higher quality Ultra HD streams and ability to connect to more devices *Intelligent auto channel selection ensures that the most optimal channel is selected while maintaining a seamless end user experience *Broadcom’s SmartConnect software automatically ensures that 802.11ac devices in the home are not sharing airtime with slower Wi-Fi devices *Explicit Tx Beamforming and AnyBeam provide extended reach for critical video streaming links *Broadcom’s standards compliance ensures interoperability with currently shipping and future 802.11ac-based devices *High-performance networked attached storage capability with the ability to deliver up to 1 Gbps NAS performance *Broadcom’s Intelligent Quality of Service (iQoS) software identifies incoming traffic and allocates bandwidth so that streaming applications get the highest priority while other applications, like file downloads, run at a lower priority ===Specifications=== :[http://core0.staticworld.net/images/article/2015/01/dir-895l-100538539-orig.png Specification] *[http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 CPU: BCM47094] *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''Anandtech'''] ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32733-broadcom-announces-mu-mimo-tri-band-architecture On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] - ''AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bnews%5D-networking-@-ces-2015-a-4930900.html ''CES 2015'' on '''HardwareZone'''] :[[D-Link DIR-885L/R]] - ''AC3100 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DIR-890L rev A1|D-Link DIR-890L/R]] - ''AC3200 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DIR-895L/R]] - ''AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DWA-192]] - ''AC1900 Wi-Fi USB Adapter'' [http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1900-wi-fi-usb-adapter/ PPage] (US) :USB 3.0, 3T3R 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz 600+1300Mbps) ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[ASUS RT-AC5300]] *[[D-Link DIR-885L/R]] *[[Netgear R8500]] __NOTOC__
